rooms.name: Scandinavian Living & Dining Area
rooms.description: An open-plan living and dining area with large windows for ample natural light, minimalist design elements, and neutral color palette. Features a central Scandinavian-style dining table.

rooms.name: Scandinavian Kitchen
rooms.description: Modern kitchen with sleek cabinetry, energy-efficient appliances and ample storage following Scandinavian design principles.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Cozy master bedroom with ample natural light, a minimalist Scandinavian aesthetic and large west-facing window for Vastu principles.

rooms.name: En-suite Bathroom
rooms.description: Modern ensuite bathroom designed with Scandinavian style fixtures, minimalist tiles and essential amenities.

rooms.name: Workspace
rooms.description: Minimalist workspace with clean lines and adequate natural lighting, ideal for telecommuting.

openings.description: Large windows in the living area and master bedroom, oriented west for improved lighting as per Vastu principles.
Two-car garage door integrated with the rear wall, providing easy access to the garden and additional storage.

garden.description: Expansive garden designed with Scandinavian landscaping elements and native plants. Features a patio area for outdoor relaxation.
